x10.constraint.xnative
Class XNativeConstraintSystem

java.lang.Object
  x10.constraint.xnative.XNativeConstraintSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
XConstraintSystem
public class XNativeConstraintSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements XConstraintSystem

Factory class producing XNativeTerms to be used with XNativeConstraints.

Author:
lshadare

Make and return op(terms1,..., termsn) -- an expression with operator op and arguments terms. If atomicFormula is true then this is marked as an atomicFormula, else it is considered a term (a function application term).
